content.description:
Historically, development on this area began in 2012. Trails and brush were cleared to create an easier area to learn how to ice climb.

 The shower heads were aimed up a bit high instead of letting the water run down the first time ice was farmed. It reportedly created some amazing features on the trees and it looked like a wild imaginary land.

Ice has not been farmed here for the last 3 years and there are no current plans for farming.
